mapper.update: UPDATE member SET last_login_date = NOW() WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT member_no memberNo, member_id memberId, member_pw memberPw, member_name memberName, member_age memberAge, member_tel memberTel, member_email memberEmail, member_level memberLevel, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_pw = #{memberPw}
